name: Ollie CARTER, Appellant, v. Donald VAUGHN, Superintendent, Thomas Cane, Record Office, et. al, Appellees

parties: Ollie CARTER, Appellant, v. Donald VAUGHN, Superintendent, Thomas Cane, Record Office, et. al, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 13th day of September, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: Laura J.N. Failing, Camp Hill, for Donald Vaughn.
casebody.head_matter:
809 A.2d 899
Ollie CARTER, Appellant, v. Donald VAUGHN, Superintendent, Thomas Cane, Record Office, et. al, Appellees.
No. 51 EAP 2001.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 13, 2002.
Ollie Carter, pro se.
Laura J.N. Failing, Camp Hill, for Donald Vaughn.
